title: Did this Nobel Prize winner say COVID-19 was established in a lab?
subtitle: It should be borne in mind that the opinion of one person does not exceed the consensus of the scientific community.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The 2008 Nobel Prize laureate Luke Montañier said that the disease of the krona-19 virus had been created artificially in a laboratory by biologists working on the AIDS vaccine.
